public class SellButtonActionListener extends Object implements ActionListener
Author:
Madison Reilly (jre129), David Williamson (dwi79) Action Listener class for the Shop selling GUI, Implements Java.awt.event.ActionListener

  • Constructor Details

    • SellButtonActionListener

      public SellButtonActionListener(int sellIndex, String purchaseString, Shop shop, boolean reserves, JFrame currentwindowFrame)
      Constructor, used to set the values to allow the sell button to function
      Parameters:
      sellIndex - Index of the item/athlete being sold in the players athlete/item array
      reserves - Set this to true when selling athletes from the reserve team
      purchaseString - String which references the type of sale (Item/Athlete)
      shop - The shop class which the sale is going to be completed through
      currentWindowFrame - The current View Detail JFrame

      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent class being parsed when an action is performed
